## Dependency management

`pyenv` allows you to install specific python versions

`poetry` or `uv` are good dependency management softwares, with very clear documentation. It is an essential to (a) preserve your own projects throughout time (b) facilitate sharing between collaborators.

:::{.callout}
In order to run the code on windows machine, use `python -m shiny run` might be required
:::
